not_turning_on: Check the power cable and ensure it is firmly connected.
Verify that the wall outlet is working by trying another device.
Remove the battery (if removable), reconnect power, and hold the power button for 10 seconds.
If the laptop still does not turn on, contact support.
overheating: Ensure the laptop is on a hard, flat surface.
Clean the vents to remove dust.

no_sound: Check Bluetooth connection or audio cable.
Ensure the volume is not muted on the device.
Try pairing with another device to isolate the issue.
static_noise: Ensure the headphones are fully charged.
Move away from potential sources of interference like Wi-Fi routers.
Try resetting the headphones as per the user manual.
not_powering_on: Charge the headphones for at least 30 minutes.
Check if the charging cable and adapter are working properly.
If the issue persists, contact support.
